name: React README
readmeText:
# React Project

This is a React project README template. It covers all the basics of setting up, running, and deploying a React application.

## Installation

```bash
npm install
```

## Usage

```bash
npm start
```

## Features
- Component-based architecture
- Hooks for managing state and side effects
- Support for custom themes

Happy coding!

name: Next.js README
readmeText:
# Next.js Project

This template is designed for a Next.js project, providing details on setup and usage.

## Getting Started

First, install the dependencies:

```bash
npm install
```

Then run the development server:

```bash
npm run dev
```

## Key Features
- Server-side rendering (SSR)
- Static site generation (SSG)
- API routes for backend functionality

Deploy easily to Vercel!

name: Flask README
readmeText:
# Flask Application

This README template provides a basic overview of a Flask project.

## Setup

1. Install dependencies:

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

2. Run the application:

```bash
flask run
```

## Features
- RESTful API support
- Lightweight and fast
- Jinja2 templating for dynamic HTML

Use this template to start building Python-powered web apps!

name: Vue README
readmeText:
# Vue Project

A README template tailored for Vue projects. It includes setup, usage, and features.

## Installation

```bash
npm install
```

## Running the App

```bash
npm run serve
```

## Features
- Reactive data binding
- Vue Router for single-page navigation
- Vuex for state management

Perfect for building dynamic, front-end applications!
